title: Mac Client Won't Even Open
body:
Every time I double click the LoL launch on my desktop or in my applications folder it isn't even showing me the logo it is simply doing nothing. This happened after trying various fixes for the 'Unspecified error, check logs for more information' bug. This bug had also followed a large amount of times when I couldn't get in game because of a pop up for 'atmos' that stopped the game from loading and running at all forcing me to force quit just so that I could close that window and try to reconnect only to get the same thing again.

Any ideas? Thank you to anyone who is able to help me

P.S also for some reason I can't download the mac client from the oce.leagueoflegends.com website

replies.body:
Hi,

There are a couple of stickies in this board that might relate to your issues.

First up - [Mac Client Won't Even Open](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/kcQdkTJX-mac-issue-unable-to-open-lolpatcher)

Second, if you are having trouble downloading, this is actually an issue that has been reported a bit lately.  It sometimes relates to your PC or ISP having out of date DNS information.  Try looking at the instructions in [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom) for changing your DNS settings.  The first comment by Riot Zaps should have the info you need.

Let me know how it goes.

Cheers
Mindstar

Update it worked and let me log in but then the moment I tried to test and play a bots match the client broke down and now I can open it but it just sits on the patcher screen for a few seconds and then stops

Thank you so much the going through package contents and opening the patcher first finally made it so that I can open league next I'm gonna try repair my client and hope that that means I can just keep it open if not then I'm perfectly happy setting up a shortcut to that folder :)
